bibl.title: Papyri in the Princeton University Collections III
bibl.seg: Johnson Allan Chester and Sidney Pullman Goodrich, Papyri in the Princeton University Collections. Vol. III. (Princeton University Studies in Papyrology. 4.)
Princeton, Princeton University Press - Oxford, Oxford University Press, 1942, 8°, xii-124 pp.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR 57 (1943) pp. 81-82. - C.W. Keyes, AJP 65 (1944) pp. 185-188. - Marcel Launey, RPhil 3e s., 22 (1948) pp. 191-192. - Naphtali Lewis, AHR 48 (1943) p. 767. - N.N. Pikus, VDI 19 (1947, fasc. 1) pp. 113-114. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 23 (1948) Nos 45-46, pp. 199-201. - C.H. Roberts, JEA 29 (1943) p. 80. - Herbert C. Youtie, CP 29 (1944) pp. 119-123 = Scriptiunculae. II (Amsterdam, 1973) pp. 845-850.
